message:
SYSTEM: 2013-09_DanielNuest-at-OEG.pdf: Página 24
Daniel Nüst @ OEG, UPM Madrid, October 2013 
24 
enviroCar – the idea 
Cars are an important part of our daily life and crucial 
for modern mobility – but we only know little about 
our personal impact on the environment when we use 
cars! 
 
Use ODB-II adapters to build a community-powered 
database of sensor measurements about cars and 
traffic. 
 
Quantified self > quantified car!
speaker: SYSTEM
